mean_cn: n. 【医】环境卫生，卫生设备，下水道设施
mean_en: the process of keeping places free from dirt, infection, disease, etc., by removing waste, trash and garbage, by cleaning streets, etc.
word_etyma: sanit健康 + ation名词后缀 → sanitation 卫生设备
sentence: Hospital sanitation is vital to disease prevention.
sentence_trans: 医院卫生对于疾病防治是至关重要的。
